title: Framing the Jordan Peterson Munk Debate
description:
This Munk debate had Jordan Peterson, Michelle Goldberg, MIchael Eric Dyson and Stephen Fry. https://youtu.be/ST6kj9OEYf0 

OK Cupid: Everyone's a little bit racist https://www.theatlantic.com/video/index/380086/the-uncomfortable-data-behind-online-dating/ 

https://www.munkdebates.com/The-Debates/Political-Correctness

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
